snippet: The lengthy scar on Juan Martin del Potro's left wrist serves as testimony to the misery the Argentine has endured since an epic Wimbledon semi-final against Novak Djokovic three years ago....
lead_paragraph: The lengthy scar on Juan Martin del Potro's left wrist serves as testimony to the misery the Argentine has endured since an epic Wimbledon semi-final against Novak Djokovic three years ago.

headline.print_headline: Del Potro Back on Big Stage After Injury Nightmare
headline.main: Del Potro Back on Big Stage After Injury Nightmare
